tr.td: Name of the application, appears in the generated documentation. Default value is ${pom.name}
The location of the PL/SQL source code. Default value is ${basedir}/src/main/sql
The location of the generated documentation (HTML files). Default value is ${maven.docs.dest}/pldoc
Specifies a list of patterns to include in the documentation generation process. Default value is **/*.sql
The encoding used in the input files. Default value is the operating system default encoding.
The overview file in HTML format.
File with CSS-stylesheet for the result documentation. If omitted, default CSS will be used.
Upper/lower case to format PL/SQL names (upper | lower). If omitted, no case conversion is done.
"yes" forces program exit when some input file cannot be processed. If "no" (the default), the file is skipped and processing continues.
JDBC URL to connect to the target database - jdbc:oracle:thin:@//{HOST}:{PORT}/{SERVICE or SID}, e.g. "jdbc:oracle:thin:@//192.168.100.1:1521/orcl"
Comma-separated list of Oracle Objects types which should be paused from the data dictionary
Comma separated list of SCHEME_NAME.OBJECT_NAME values to be checked for matching objects- these values may contain Oracle wildcards, e.g. "%" and "_"
Display list of modules which failed to parse in log output and in generated documentation.
